title: New Pokémon Snap and Returnal, a Mash-up for the Ages
description: This week we welcome back the long-wandering Griffin McElroy. And what a week it is! On the docket: two actual, major game releases, New Pokémon Snap and Returnal. They may be about as different as you could imagine, but they do both require you to play the same levels over and over again, so maybe not?
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
